title: I made account so I can rate this garbage
review: I use IMDb for many years now, but never had an account. Till this day. I saw Bladerunner 2049 just an hour ago. For many reasons I can say without any doubt. That this movie is TRASH. I have seen tens of hundreds of movies and even within the shittiest i could find something to like. This was complete waste of time. I will not even explain how many plot holes this movie has. Terrible...
